column1: Amaranth Brandybuck was a Hobbits of the Shire.
Amaranth was the second child of Gorbadoc Brandybuck and Mirabella Took.
Amaranth is a poetic name for a flower that does not fade
column3: "Giving of Names" It is also the common name for a group of 60-70 plants belonging to the family Amaranthaceae. They are used as food and in ornamental gardens; some are weeds.
